constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All applications for developments likely to attract birds or connected with an aviation use.Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer extensions with installation of 1no rooflight to front roofslope and 1no window to side gable to facilitate loft conversion.
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and rear dormer extensions with the installation of 1no rooflight to the front roofslope and 1no window to the side gable to facilitate a loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and that the Planning Condition 7 (Internal or External Plants) of planning permission 20/03344/FUL is hereby discharged subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the details hereby approved.

Please provide copies of all existing and proposed side elevations at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work.
